column5: Just a heads up. Looking for one more person to sign up for the 2012 OFC Tourney in order to add another person to each team. Deadline is tomorrow.
Actually, we need 9 more now.  Just added 10 and you are the first on the next wave of sign ups!
Oh. I was just going by the sign up page when you said that you needed 4 more people to sign up and I was the third person to do so. Oh well, always next year I guess.
Let's start a drive to get 9 people in before Sunday that's all. Not a big deal and the more the merrier.
Count me in, if there is still room!
hey guys i`ll play as well.
YESSSSSSSSSSSS Five more and it's a go! Thanks guys.
If some one will remember to tell me to hold the sign this year I will be in and get some pics last couple years my sign was there gust forgot to use it
3 more people, lets go, chop chop
Thought you were already on Team 10 Mike?
Remember the sign Mike, always, and remember you're on my team, team 10. I'm counting on you for some big musky.
Just like a woman,chop chop now. I,ll get there dear,just need to get me a beer,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,NO,RIGHT NOW.

This sounds way too cool and I'd love to join, that is, if you're willing to take on an OFC rookie . The only species on the list I won't be able to target very often is whitefish, other than that, bring it on!
A couple more and we've got the last great recruits! Let'er rip!
